    level="1"

>
[Knight in Shining Armor](/Feats.aspx?ID=1096) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Character Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=12) pg. 94 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Knight Vigilant](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=27)

**Prerequisites**
[Knight Vigilant](/Feats.aspx?ID=1092); expert in light armor, medium armor, or unarmored defense; trained in heavy armor

</column>

---

As a knight in shining armor, you train daily in the heaviest armor, expanding your expertise to heavy armor. You gain expert proficiency in heavy armor.
